content: a dear bunny snuggle rag 1 in the softest teddy yarn 2 from go handmade lovely for tucking in at bed time or as comfort when a little one is feeling upset such a lovely snuggle rag 3 one simply can t resist **materials** crochet hook us sizes c/2-d/3 3 mm g/6 4 mm and h/8 5 mm go handmade teddy yarn go handmade soft yarn go handmade embroidery yarn 1 set of safety eyes 5mm a little filling **abbreviations ** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain **st** stitch **slip_stitch** slip stitch **single_crochet** single crochet **double_crochet** double crochet **measurements ** 10x10 inches 26x26 cm **usage ** soft yarn approx 0 7 oz 20 g teddy yarn approx 2 3 oz 65 g 1 https //hobbii com/teddy-snuggle-rag-rabbit utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=teddy-snuggle-rag&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii dk/garn/teddy utm_medium=social&utm_source=facebook com&utm_campaign=blog-post&utm_content=teddy-dk&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/teddy-snuggle-rag-rabbit utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=teddy-snuggle-rag&utm_term=swr
